title: GazetaBitcoin
author: GazetaBitcoin
content: I saw yesterday, by pure chance (and while I was on my mobile phone), a topic where a guy was auctioning his Samsung S23 as he could not sell it otherwise (at least, this is what he said)... If I remember well he said the entry is 40.000 satoshis.He sounded a bit shady, as he asked for the money first and make the auction afterwards (lol), instead of using an escrow, but I thought that maybe he is new here and he does not know about escrows. Anyway, I searched again for that topic, willing to suggest him that he may look suspicious for proceeding like he did, but I can't find the topic anymore.Has anybody else seen the topic? Or know what happened to it? I don't remember OP's name... All I remember is that the topic was posted in Games and Rounds or Collectible board.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: What do you mean by this thread? Lottery Samsung galaxy S23 ultra 256GB BlackAnd here is the thread that is archived at Games and rounds - https://ninjastic.space/topic/5445699User: uglysmurfHe's saying a lottery with 75 available points but if you want to have a number you have to pay 0.000040 BTC and all the numbers have to be filled in all then he will draw the lottery, I think this is a shady lottery.

comments.author: GazetaBitcoin
comments.body: Yup, that was the topic I was looking for! Thanks, salad daging! So I did not find it anymore as it was moved to another board...Locking the topic now, as the issue was addressed.
